home.intro: I'm Kooraseru, though you might know me by my another name. This is my personal website, which I experiment with and build fun wacky experiments. This website runs off of GitHub Pages, and the source code is available on GitHub. Feel free to check it out and ~steal~ borrow any code you find interesting!
